abstract: Guests at the American Ballet Theater’s 75th anniversary peer down from opera house balcony to catch glimpse of New York University graduates.
lead_paragraph: Some “very New York moments” at a fund-raiser for the American Ballet Theater’s 75th anniversary jubilee celebration.

headline.main: For the American Ballet Theater’s 75th, Black-Tie Guests
headline.print_headline: People-Watching at a Jubilee for Dance’s Sake

snippet: Some “very New York moments” at a fund-raiser for the American Ballet Theater’s 75th anniversary jubilee celebration.
